sentences.en: "Dr Campbell," he said, clearly surprised. "What are you doing here?"
sentences.cn: “坎贝尔医生，”他显然很惊讶地说道，“您怎么在这儿？”

sentences.en: "I see anti-depressants as a lifestyle drug," says Dr Charlton.
sentences.cn: “我认为抗抑郁药是一种改善生活品质的药物，”查尔顿医生说。

sentences.en: A bounty of $50,000 was put on Dr. Alvarez's head.
sentences.cn: 有人悬赏50,000美元买阿尔瓦雷斯博士的人头。

sentences.en: After the scandal was exposed, Dr Bailey committed suicide.
sentences.cn: 丑闻曝光后，贝利博士自杀了。

sentences.en: Could you direct them to Dr Lamont's office, please?
sentences.cn: 你能告诉他们去拉蒙特医生的办公室怎么走吗？

sentences.en: Dr Kengerli looks to Turkey as his mother country.
sentences.cn: 肯戈理博士视土耳其为自己的祖国。

sentences.en: Dr Ryan travelled the world gathering material for his book.
sentences.cn: 瑞安博士周游世界为他的书搜集资料。

sentences.en: Dr Tinsley had five pieces on the board against Chinook's four.
sentences.cn: 廷斯利博士在棋盘上还有5枚棋子，对手钦诺克还有4枚。

sentences.en: Dr Williams describes it as a potential wonder drug.
sentences.cn: 威廉斯医生称其可能会成为特效药。

sentences.en: Dr. Johnson and I have been trying to build him up physically.
sentences.cn: 约翰逊医生和我一直试图增强他的体质。

sentences.en: Dr. Mesibov set forth the basis of his approach to teaching students.
sentences.cn: 梅西伯夫博士阐述了他的教学方法的基础。

sentences.en: Perhaps, he suggested tentatively, they should send for Dr Band.
sentences.cn: 他小心地建议道，也许他们应该让人去请班德大夫。

sentences.en: The Daily Express describes Dr Carey as a pretty tough nut.
sentences.cn: 《每日快报》把凯里医生说成是特别难对付的家伙。

sentences.en: The declaration was drafted by a committee chaired by Dr Robert Song.
sentences.cn: 宣言由罗伯特·桑博士领导的委员会起草。

sentences.en: They were told that Dr Albright wasn't taking any new patients.
sentences.cn: 他们被告知，奥尔布赖特医生不再接收新病人了。

trans.tran_cn: (=dead reckoning)速度三角形定位法，(=doctor)医生，博士
